Undead cows can be found west of Port Phasmatys in Morytania, near the Farming allotment. As their name suggests, they are undead, so a Salve amulet or a salve amulet (e) is effective. They are sometimes killed for their bones for the Ectofuntus, most commonly during Ghosts Ahoy and Animal Magnetism.

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

  • Undead cow after 15 February 2005 (update)

  • Undead cow after 20 March 2007 (update)

  • Undead cow after 26 November 2013 (update)

  • Undead cow after 22 April 2014 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 12 February 2024 (Update):
    • Rebalanced several low level monsters that were harder to kill than intended
  • patch 17 April 2023 (Update):
    • Fixed the issue of incorrect souls being captured by Ushabti.
  • patch 11 April 2023 (Update):
    • Can be killed as part of the new undead slayer task.
  • update 15 February 2005 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When a player stands in the area in which the cows wander, they can sometimes hear a ghostly moo, similar to the ones a player hears when they stand in a normal cow area.
